Get Involved:
=============

[![Savvy Citizen](https://www.kenedytx.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?i=kQm%2Fa8eNdhFgnBl5P%2Fub1sQn%252B9iIrv5XoKn51JKqoRni3FDovE0MxrJeYwat41A5&s=large)](https://savvycitizenapp.com/citizen?ref=plugin:6912886d-3397-4113-a0e9-7a99f92f5b6f?)

[![](../ic?i=news&c2=transparent&c1=%23ffffff&c3=%236d2534)Read Our Newsletter](https://www.kenedytx.gov/newsletter)

*Kenedy is a small town with big opportunities—the perfect place to live and do business. We invite you to take in all that Kenedy has to offer, from our newly renovated park and walking trail to the rolling hills that come alive in the spring with beautiful displays of wildflowers. Welcome to Kenedy, Texas, home of the Eagle Ford Shale!*

![](https://www.kenedytx.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?i=3xY5dVZD%252B6nbDE18Si%2F4QbLDo1yVOrDSurJ9dWP0Rj73HNHLMWgf5mC9SGxmh%2Fn6&s=large)

303 West Main Street, Kenedy, TX 78118  
[(830) 583-2230](tel:8305832230) | [(830) 780-3931](tel:1-830-780-3931) (after-hours emergency)  
[citysecretary@kenedytx.gov](mailto:citysecretary@kenedytx.gov)  
  
**Office Hours:** Monday–Friday, 8 am–5 pm

### Section Tools

Hello

Create your Passkey

Remove your Passkey

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.

  
  

Logout
